page.title: 03Tourism in Leiston
page.content: Leiston is a peaceful town near the sea with a lot of other things near by.If you are interested in history there is a museum showing you old traction engines and lots of old machinery used long ago and made at Garrets of Leiston .The Abbey, Orford and Framlingham castles are also worth seeing. For sportsmen and women there is fishing at Haylings pond and Thorpness. There is golf and sailing at Thorpness and Aldeburgh.If you like bird watching Leiston is surrounded by countryside and there is a famous bird reserve at Minsmere 3 miles away. There are good shopping places at Ipswich,Norwich or Woodbridge. There are good camping sites as well and small hotels or bed and breakfast places where you can stay. There is not much public transport so you would need to have a car.
